source.c18792bd:
# CDF 
counts, bin_edges = np.histogram(haberman_1['axil_nodes'], bins=30, 
                                 density = True)
pdf = counts/(sum(counts))
#compute CDF
cdf = np.cumsum(pdf)
plt.plot(bin_edges[1:], cdf)

counts, bin_edges = np.histogram(haberman_2['axil_nodes'], bins=30,
                                 density = True)
pdf = counts/(sum(counts))

#compute CDF
cdf = np.cumsum(pdf)
plt.plot(bin_edges[1:], cdf)
plt.legend([1,2]);


plt.show();

source.7e5b9724:
#Box plot
figure, axisarray = plt.subplots(1, 3, figsize = (33, 15))
sbn.boxplot(x='surv_status',y='axil_nodes', data=haberman,ax=axisarray[0])
sbn.boxplot(x='surv_status',y='age', data=haberman,ax=axisarray[1])
sbn.boxplot(x='surv_status',y='op_year', data=haberman,ax=axisarray[2])
plt.show()
